description: The radio has stopped transmitting due to a fault. There may be a jammed channel.
The user should change the AP to the different channel or check if there is a RF hardware issue.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SRAP-WCM-MIB::radioTransmitStop RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 SRAP-WCM-MIB::apMyMacAddr s EXAMPL SRAP-WCM-MIB::apRadioChannel i 1

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex

description: The MAC address of the ACCESS Point.
variables.name: SRAP-WCM-MIB::apMyMacAddr

description: This attribute is Radio Channel.
This attribute can be written when apRadioAutoSense is disabled.
variables.name: SRAP-WCM-MIB::apRadioChannel

description: The radio has stopped receiving due to a fault. There may be a jammed channel.
The user should change the AP to the different channel or check if there is a RF hardware issue.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SRAP-WCM-MIB::radioReceiveStop RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 SRAP-WCM-MIB::apMyMacAddr s EXAMPL SRAP-WCM-MIB::apRadioChannel i 1

variables.name: SRAP-WCM-MIB::apRadioChannel

description: Exceed max 256 Associated clients. No more association of wireless clients allowed.
The user can disassociate the idle wirless clients.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SRAP-WCM-MIB::exceedMaxAssociated RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 SRAP-WCM-MIB::apMyMacAddr s EXAMPL

starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer

description: The number of Wireless Clients association reaches the threshold of the AP.
Please check the MIB object, thresholdAssociated. The default is 200.
The number of wireless client is more than the value of thresholdAssociated.
This will affect the performace of the AP.

event.Summary: Number of wireless clients associated reached the threshold

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SRAP-WCM-MIB::exceedtThresholdAssociated RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 SRAP-WCM-MIB::apMyMacAddr s EXAMPL
